thread.title: Emerging Artist Announces “In the Air”—A Solo Art Exhibit in Miami Beach
thread.title_full: Emerging Artist Announces “In the Air”—A Solo Art Exhibit in Miami Beach

author: prbuzz.com
title: Emerging Artist Announces “In the Air”—A Solo Art Exhibit in Miami Beach
text:
MIAMI BEACH, Florida—October 6, 2015—Emerging artist, Nathan Gilbert, recently announced his solo art exhibit “In the Air.” This solo art show will be held in the heart of Miami Beach during the most important and most influent art related event in the world; The Miami Beach Art Basel. This event takes place during the beginning of December, the third through the sixth to be exact. It will also be the artist's first international solo show, and no one should miss it. The “In the Air” exhibit will be opened from 11:00 AM to 9:00 PM on December third, fourth, fifth, and sixth. It is open to public and free of entry, but it’s recommended that interested parties RSVP at This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. .
However, artist Nathan Gilbert needs help with the production costs of the exhibit. That’s why he launched this Kickstarter campaign . The goal of this project is to raise $15,000 CAD by November 5, 2015. The funds raised will go towards the expense of putting on the solo show. Backers of this project will receive some very exclusive and unique content from the photo collections used to make the exhibition's artwork. Including limited edition prints, personalized message from the artist and even some custom pieces.
To help bring this incredible exhibit to life, please visit the Kickstarter campaign or click here . Perks will be delivered between November 2015 and March 2016.
Please keep in mind this is an “all-or-nothing” deal, which means if the campaign does not reach the funding goal then the project cannot move forward. So know that any amount given can make a difference, and this is an incredible opportunity to be a part of a special campaign! Help Nathan Gilbert reach the goal by sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks. The more people know about this, the more support the campaign will receive.
Contact: Nathan Gilbert
Title: Artist - Photographer
